name: Brick Attack (itch)
description:
This is pretty much a Breakout clone. The goal is to break as many bricks as you can to score high points. You move the paddle left and right and hit the ball with the paddle to keep the ball in play. As bricks go down the ball will go faster so keep in Rythm and don't blink or you'll miss the ball. This game has 2 Variations. Normal Brick Attack and Moving Brick Attack.

Mouse = Move Paddle

Escape = Exit the game

F1 = View Manual

F2 = Reset The Game

F3 = Change Game Variation

F4 = Change Window Size

F5 = Save Game

F6 = Load Game
